sentences.en: Did you learn anything in your day, as a student?
sentences.cn: 你在学生时代学到什么东西了吗？

sentences.en: Eventually, you'll learn to cry that on the inside.
sentences.cn: 终有一天，你会学会让泪往心里流。

sentences.en: I was amazed to learn she was still writing her stories.
sentences.cn: 得知她仍然在写自己的小说，我感到很惊讶。

sentences.en: I would have to learn, little by little, to exist alone.
sentences.cn: 我得慢慢学会独自生活。

sentences.en: It is not surprising that children learn to read at different rates.
sentences.cn: 小孩子识字的速度不同，这不足为奇。

sentences.en: It was important for children to learn to express themselves clearly.
sentences.cn: 孩子学会清楚地表达自己很重要。

sentences.en: It'san exciting opportunity to learn what goes on behind the scenes.
sentences.cn: 可以有机会了解幕后的工作，令人非常兴奋。

sentences.en: Looking back helps insofar as it helps you learn from your mistakes.
sentences.cn: 审视过去的作用是能帮你从错误中吸取教训。

sentences.en: The company failed to learn any lessons from this experience.
sentences.cn: 公司未能从这次经历中吸取任何教训。

sentences.en: The psychiatrist must learn to maintain an unusual degree of objectivity.
sentences.cn: 精神科医生务必要学会保持超乎寻常的客观态度。

sentences.en: The student will learn from experience about the importance of planning.
sentences.cn: 学生将从经验中学到制订计划的重要性。

sentences.en: The teacher’s task is to help the pupil learn.
sentences.cn: 老师的任务是帮助学生学习。

sentences.en: There is a great deal to learn from Hal's expert approach.
sentences.cn: 从哈尔熟练的方法中可以学到很多。

sentences.en: What’s the best way to learn a language?
sentences.cn: 学习语言的最佳方法是什么？

sentences.en: You have to learn to take care of your possessions.
sentences.cn: 你得学会保管好自己的财物。

sentences.en: You may have to learn a few new skills along the way.
sentences.cn: 在这个过程中你可能还得新学几招。

sentences.en: You might think Hungarian a pushover to learn. It is not.
sentences.cn: 你可能认为匈牙利语很容易学。其实不然。

sentences.en: You will learn what to expect as your child matures physically.
sentences.cn: 在孩子身体发育成熟时，你就知道会发生什么事了。
